member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION
member.summary: Represents a codec configuration structure for video encoding.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION.DataSize
member.summary: The data size of the provided codec configuration structure.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION.pH264Config
member.summary: A pointer to a structure containing codec configuration parameters for H.264 encoding.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION.pHEVCConfig
member.summary: A pointer to a structure containing codec configuration parameters for HEVC encoding.
